title: Pen Tester- Cyber Security Engineer L1
skills: Cybersecurity, Mobile Development, JIRA, Java, Penetration Testing, ASP.Net, Software Development, Software Engineering, Vulnerability Scanning, Web Applications, API, Mobile Application Testing
description:
Conduct formal testing on computer systems 
 
Assess the security of computer software and hardware
 
Conduct security audits and legal cyberattack simulations by designing and utilizing hacking tools to access designated pieces of data during a predetermined time frame
 
Generate tools for breaking into security systems 
 
Detect and correct system weaknesses 
 
Provide recommendations based on an assessment of hardware and software systems 
 
Implement solutions to enhance data security
 
Provide IT support
 
Planning, implementing, managing, monitoring, and upgrading security measures for the protection of the organization's data, systems, and networks.
 
Troubleshooting security and network problems.
 
Responding to all system and/or network security breaches.
 
Ensuring that the organization's data and infrastructure are protected by enabling the appropriate security controls.
 
Participating in the change management process.
 
Testing and identifying network and system vulnerabilities.
 
Daily administrative tasks, reporting, and communication with the relevant departments in the organization.
requirements:
Requirements
• Good knowledge of tools used for web application penetration testing.
 
• Good knowledge of tools used for network penetration testing.
 
• Experience conducting advanced penetration testing exercises (Web applications, Mobile Applications, APIs and Network)
 
• Developing, extending, or modifying exploits, shellcode or exploit tools.
 
• Vulnerability assessment / Security assessment tools
 
• Familiarity with security public standards and testing methodologies: OWASP top 10 for Mobile, Web and API. OWASP Application Security Verification Standard (ASVS), MITRE ATT&CK, etc.
 
• Proficiency with one or more programming languages: JAVA, ASP.net , PHP, C/C++, Python, GO, etc.
 
• Experience in developing cybersecurity testing tools, and exploits development
 
• Industry certifications preferred (e.g., GPEN, GWAPT, OSCP, OSWE, eWPTX, etc.) ( not required)

title: Managing Director - Generators Industry
skills: generator, diesel generator, International Business Development, Management, Engineering
description:
Our client is a leading provider of engineering and contracting solutions. This role will be responsible for leading the Generator Business Unit, ensuring excellence across key operational areas as outlined below:
 
--1. Engineering Department Management (Technical Office & Tendering):
- Provide technical leadership and mentorship to engineering teams to enhance processes, efficiency, and capabilities.  
- Oversee the preparation and review of technical and commercial proposals to ensure competitiveness and compliance with client requirements.
 
2. Start-up, Commissioning, and Warranty Management:
- Supervise the start-up and commissioning activities of new diesel generator installations, ensuring seamless integration and reliable operation at client sites.  
- Manage the commissioning team to ensure compliance with client specifications and optimal performance of equipment.  
- Lead the guarantee and warranty process, ensuring timely resolution of post-installation technical issues and maintaining high customer satisfaction.
 
3. Sales and Market Expansion:
- Develop and implement sales strategies to drive business growth across the Libyan, Egyptian, and Saudi markets.  
- Cultivate strong relationships with key clients, distributors, and strategic partners to maximize market penetration.  
- Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify growth opportunities and align product offerings with customer needs.  
- Support the sales team in managing key accounts and closing high-value deals.
4. After-Sales Service and Customer Support:
- Oversee all aspects of after-sales service, ensuring responsive and effective support to address customer issues.  
- Ensure timely maintenance, troubleshooting, and technical support to uphold service excellence and customer satisfaction.
 
5. Logistics, Supply Chain, and Vendor Management:
-  logistics, shipping, transportation, insurance, warehousing, and inventory to ensure efficient operations and cost control.  
- Strengthen relationships with factories and suppliers to enhance collaboration and supply chain reliability.
requirements:
MANAGING DIRECTOR FOR DIESEL GENRATOR 
Engineering Department Management(  technical office & tendering ) : Provide technical guidance and mentorship to engineering staff to improve processes and capabilities.
Startup and Commissioning & Guarantee Management  :
Supervise the start-up commissioning process for new diesel generators, ensuring smooth integration and operation at customer sites.
Manage the commissioning team to ensure that equipment meets client specifications and operational efficiency.
Oversee the guarantee and warranty management processes, ensuring timely response and resolution of any technical issues post-installation.
Sales and Market Expansion:
Develop and execute sales strategies to drive revenue growth in the Libyan, Egyptian, and Saudi Arabian markets.
 Build strong relationships with key clients, distributors, and partners in each market.
Lead market analysis to identify new opportunities and maintain a competitive edge.
Ensure alignment between product offerings and customer needs in each market.
Manage key accounts and support the sales team in closing major deals.
After-Sales Services and Support
Oversee all after-sales services, ensuring timely and effective resolution of customer issues.
Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction through prompt maintenance, troubleshooting, and technical support.
Logistics, Shipping, and Transportation, Insurance ,Warehousing and Inventory Management
Enhancing Relations with the Factory
 
Qualifications:
Education: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering (Mechanical/Electrical) or Business Administration (Master’s degree preferred).
Experience: At least 10-15 years of experience in the diesel generator industry, with a minimum of 5 years in a senior management or leadership role.
Skills:
Strong leadership and decision-making abilities.
Extensive experience in engineering, commissioning, after-sales services, logistics, shipping, insurance, warehousing, and factory relations.
Proven track record in sales and market expansion, particularly in Libya, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia.
Knowledge of logistics, supply chain management, and operations.
In-depth knowledge of diesel generators and power generation technologies.
Ability to manage cross-functional teams effectively and foster collaboration.
Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
Fluency in Arabic and English (both written and spoken).

title: On-Site Corporate Sales Executive
skills: Sales, sales skills, Healthcare, Sales Target, Selling, Corporate Sales
description:
Providing customers with quotations: 
Prepare and deliver accurate and competitive quotations based on customer requirements, ensuring all details are clearly communicated.
Presenting the company profile:
 Professionally present the company’s profile, highlighting key benefits, exclusions, and competitive advantages. Ensure that potential clients clearly understand the value proposition.
Representing the organization at industry events:
 Act as the face of the company at trade exhibitions, industry events, and product demonstrations. Engage with potential clients, partners, and stakeholders to build relationships and expand the company’s network.
Negotiating with company HR:
 Work closely with company HR to negotiate variations in pricing, delivery schedules, and product specifications, ensuring that both customer needs and company goals are met.
Identifying new markets and business opportunities:
 Continuously research and identify new markets, business opportunities, and potential clients. Develop strategies to penetrate these markets effectively.
Updating and managing customer databases:
 Regularly update and maintain customer databases, ensuring that all contact information, communication history, and sales progress are accurately recorded.
Assessing and communicating financial risks:
 Evaluate the degree of financial risk associated with each customer or deal and communicate findings to the supervisor for appropriate action.
Achieving and exceeding sales targets:
 Consistently work towards achieving and exceeding set sales targets and objectives. Develop and implement strategies to improve sales performance.
Skilled negotiation and persuasion:
 Use strong negotiation and persuasion skills to influence client decisions, overcome objections, and guide clients toward favorable outcomes.
Problem-solving and reasoning:
 Utilize logic and critical thinking to identify the strengths and weaknesses of various solutions, conclusions, or approaches to challenges, ensuring the best outcomes for both the client and the company.
Building and maintaining client relationships:
 Develop and nurture long-term relationships with clients, providing ongoing support and ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction.
Collaborating with internal teams:
 Work closely with marketing, product development, and customer service teams to align strategies, share insights, and ensure a cohesive approach to meeting customer needs.
Reporting and analysis:
 Prepare regular reports on sales performance, market trends, and customer feedback. Provide insights and recommendations for improving sales strategies.
requirements:
Bachelor’s Degree from an accredited college or university, preferably in healthcare and healthcare management.
1 to 2 years experience in the sales field preferred for selling services.

title: QualityAsurance Lead / Test Lead
skills: ISTQB, Agile, Software Development, Selenium, Cypress, CI/CD Integration
description:
We are looking for a QA Lead / Test Lead to oversee the quality assurance process, ensuring the reliability, security, and performance of software applications. The ideal candidate should have strong expertise in test automation, CI/CD integration, and Agile testing practices. This role requires hands-on experience with manual and automated testing, as well as leadership skills to guide and mentor the QA team.
Key Responsibilities:
1. Test Strategy & Planning
 Define and implement the QA strategy, test plans, and testing processes in an Agile Scrum environment.
 Ensure test coverage for functional, regression, performance, security, and API testing.
 Collaborate with Product Owners, Developers, and DevOps engineers to align testing efforts with business goals.
2. Test Execution & Automation:
 Lead the development and execution of automated test scripts for web and API testing.
 Implement and maintain test automation frameworks (Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, JUnit, TestNG, RestAssured, etc.).
 Ensure integration of automated tests with CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI/CD).
 Oversee manual testing where automation is not feasible.
3. Agile Testing & Continuous Quality Improvement:
 Drive shift-left testing, ensuring early involvement in the development cycle.
 Conduct Exploratory Testing, Smoke Testing, and UAT (User Acceptance Testing).
 Define and track QA metrics (defect density, test coverage, test execution rate, etc.).
 Advocate for TDD (Test-Driven Development) and BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) practices.
4. Performance & Security Testing:
 Oversee performance and load testing using tools like JMeter, Gatling, or k6.
 Ensure security testing best practices, identifying vulnerabilities through penetration testing and API security assessments.
5. Team Leadership & Collaboration:
 Lead and mentor the QA team, ensuring knowledge sharing and upskilling.
 Collaborate with development, DevOps, and product teams to improve software quality.
 Conduct code reviews for test scripts and ensure testing best practices.
requirements:
Technical Skills:
 5+ years of experience in software testing, with at least 2 years in a QA lead role.
 Expertise in test automation tools (Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, JUnit, TestNG, etc.).
 Strong experience with API testing (Postman, RestAssured, Karate, SoapUI).
 Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps integration (Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes).
 Experience with performance testing tools (JMeter, Gatling, k6).
 Familiarity with security testing tools (OWASP ZAP, Burp Suite, SonarQube).
 Strong understanding of Agile Scrum and QA processes.
Leadership & Agile Skills:
 Experience leading QA teams and mentoring testers.
 Strong knowledge of Agile testing principles and practices.
 Excellent problem-solving skills and analytical mindset.
 Strong communication skills to work with cross-functional teams.
Preferred Certifications:
 ISTQB (Foundation or Advanced Level) Certification.
 Certified Agile Tester (CAT) or Certified Scrum Master (CSM

title: Information Security Section Head
skills: computer, Information Technology (IT), ISO
description:
Job Description
 
Design and implement Security policies according to the ISO 27001 guidelines
 
Conduct regular security assessments, vulnerability scans, and penetration tests to identify and address potential weaknesses and threats according to the annual schedule plan.

Firewall logs monitor and analysis

Working according the ISO 27001 framework controls

title: Customer & Market Knowledge Analyst
skills: Analysis, Customer Support, Customer Service, Market Research, Research
description:
The Customer & Market Knowledge Analyst will gather, analyze, and interpret customer and market data, primarily external, to support managers & brands to make strategic decisions. The role will involve a mix of qualitative and quantitative research methodologies to deliver actionable insights that drive business growth, product development, and marketing strategies. The successful candidate will work cross-functionally, collaborating with key stakeholders to bring data-backed insights and translate them into actions. 
job Purpose:
 
Collaborate with key stakeholders to deliver fact-based, objective views of the brands. 
Identify strategic possibilities for business growth through market development (higher penetration, frequency, Intensity of purchase) and tactical opportunities for the marketing teams to capitalize on. 
Use your innate ability and passion to understand and empathize with consumers and customers to deliver valuable insights to the business. 
Working with your manager to identify consumer and market trends across MENA and using these to shape brand strategies.  
1. Market Research & Customer Insights
 
Design and Conduct Research
: Execute market research studies (both qualitative and quantitative research methodologies) to build actionable recommendations & solve business issues. 
Competitive Analysis
: Continuously monitor competitors’ strategies, product offerings, and market positioning to assess potential opportunities and threats. 
Trend Analysis
: Identify and interpret macroeconomic & category trends to understand how they impact customer behavior and business performance.  
Market understanding
: proactively using secondary (desktop research) data sources to understand customer preferences, buying behaviors, and satisfaction levels. Responsible for providing categories yearly forecasted growth and other macroeconomic KPIs to support brand growth. 
 
 
2. Cross-Functional Collaboration
 
Stakeholder Communication
: Present research findings to internal teams, including marketing, Operations, and Business Directors, ensuring they have clear, actionable insights. 
Partnerships with External Agencies
: Build relationships with third-party market research agencies, ensuring projects are delivered on time and within budget. 
Cross Departmental Collaboration
:  
Collaborate with various departments to ensure customer insights are integrated into the brand’s overall strategy, from correct portfolio play to customer experience. 
Assist in the development and implementation of action plans for your key brands based on insights. 
Product & Service Innovation
: Partner with the Marketing and Operations teams within brands (demand planning) to help grow the business, identify unmet customer needs and validate product concepts before market introduction. 
 
 
3. Performance Tracking & Reporting
 
KPI Measurement
: Monitor key performance indicators (11 Alshaya Measures) related to brand’s awareness, consideration, as well as other brand health tracker KPIs, market share, DNA statements, etc. 
Campaign Evaluation
: Track the effectiveness of marketing campaigns, adjusting strategies based on performance insights, leveraging external as well as internal data in the process. 
Regular Reporting
: Produce and present regular market and customer insights reports, ensuring key stakeholders remain informed about changing market conditions and customer sentiment, primarily the quarterly BHT presentations.
requirements:
Technical Skills:
 
Good understanding of quantitative research solutions: e.g., BHT, U&A studies, listing studies, segmentation...etc. 
Experience in Qualitative Research: Experience in designing focus groups, in-depth interviews, and thematic analysis. 
A/B Testing and Experimentation: Familiarity with designing and interpreting experiments to test different campaigns or product hypotheses. 
Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret complex datasets. 
Highly proficient with Excel & PowerPoint tools. 
Soft Skills:
 
Analytical Thinking: Critical thinking, problem-solving 
Communication: Data storytelling and presentation 
Collaboration: Cross-functional teamwork, influencing skills 
Attention to Detail: Accuracy, thoroughness 
Adaptability: Flexibility, handling ambiguity 
Strategic Thinking: Business acumen, big picture mindset 
Curiosity: Inquisitiveness, passion for learning 
Time Management: Prioritization, multitasking 
Problem-Solving: Solution-oriented, decision-making 
Emotional Intelligence: Empathy, conflict resolution 
Creativity: Innovative thinking
 
Academic Background & Experience:
 
Bachelor’s degree in business administration, Economics, Finance, Marketing or Engineering. 
3-5 years of experience implementing market research studies, developing insights into actions. Preferred experience within FMCGs or on the agency side (Ipsos, Kantar, Nielsen or other).

title: Sales Engineer Oil and Gas
skills: oil and gas, Petroleum, Sales, Sales Engineering, Science, Engineering, gas, Mechanical Engineering, Oil, oil & gas, English, Microsoft Office, Oil Analysis, Sales Target, Outdoor Sales
description:
Job Description: Sales Engineer (3-4 years of experience)
Location:
 Egypt
Industry:
 Oil & Gas
Department:
 Sales
Reports to:
 Account Manager
Position Summary:
We are seeking a motivated and technically skilled Sales Engineer with a strong background in mechanical, materials, or petroleum engineering to join our team. The ideal candidate will have 3-4 years of experience in the oil and gas sector in Egypt and be able to assist in developing key accounts and expanding our market presence. This individual will work closely with the Account Manager to penetrate the oil and gas market, arrange client meetings, and conduct seminars for key accounts. The Sales Engineer will also manage the full sales cycle, from lead generation to closing, and maintain strong relationships with clients.
Key Responsibilities:
Market Penetration & Account Development:
Assist the Account Manager in identifying new opportunities and clients within the oil and gas sector in Egypt.
Support the development and implementation of strategies to penetrate the market, targeting key accounts.
Help drive business growth through market research, understanding client needs, and providing tailored solutions.
Client Engagement & Relationship Building:
Initiate and schedule meetings with key clients to present products, services, and solutions.
Build and maintain strong, long-lasting relationships with existing and prospective clients.
Coordinate and organize seminars, workshops, and product demonstrations for clients, showcasing the company’s offerings.
Sales Cycle Management:
Manage the full sales cycle, from identifying leads to finalizing contracts and closing sales.
Collaborate with internal teams to ensure timely delivery of solutions to meet client expectations.
Provide timely updates to the Account Manager regarding sales progress, client feedback, and market trends.
Technical Support & Product Expertise:
Serve as a technical advisor for clients, ensuring a deep understanding of the company’s products and services.
Leverage your engineering background to provide technical solutions that align with client needs.
Stay updated on industry developments, product innovations, and competitor offerings in the oil and gas sector.
Reporting & Documentation:
Maintain accurate records of sales activities, client interactions, and sales forecasts.
Prepare and present reports on sales performance and market analysis.
requirements:
Qualifications:
Education:
 Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering, Materials Science, Petroleum Engineering, or a related field.
Experience:
3-4 years of sales engineering experience, preferably in the oil and gas sector in Egypt.
Proven track record of sales success and experience in managing key accounts.
Familiarity with the full sales cycle, from prospecting to closing deals.
Experience in arranging meetings, product demonstrations, and seminars for clients is highly desirable.
Skills & Competencies:
Strong understanding of oil and gas industry operations, processes, and key technologies.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage effectively with clients.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Strong organizational and time-management skills.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and CRM systems.
Other Requirements:
Ability to travel within Egypt as needed.
Knowledge of Arabic and English (spoken and written) is essential.
Why Join Us?
This is an exciting opportunity for a driven and technically proficient Sales Engineer to advance their career in the dynamic oil and gas sector. You will be working in a collaborative environment with experienced professionals and have the chance to make a significant impact in a growing market.
If you are passionate about sales, have a strong technical background, and are eager to contribute to the success of a leading company in the oil and gas industry, we encourage you to apply!

title: Electrical Panels and Automation Business Unit Director
skills: MBA, Electrical Engineering, Leadership Management, Decision Making, Strategic Planning, Automation Engineering, Automation, Panels, Electrical Panels, Installements, KNX, BMS, Design, Technical Office Engineering, Tendering, Pricing, Budgeting
description:
*Strategic Planning and Budgeting
-Develop a comprehensive strategic plan for the Boards and Automation unit, including sales targets and plans to penetrate the markets and expand sales in cooperation with the Director of the Commercial Sector and in line with the vision and objectives of the company.
-Setting the short and long-term objectives of the unit and following up on their implementation.
-Prepare the unit's annual budget in coordination with the various departments and ensure compliance with it.
-Monitor the financial performance of the unit and submit periodic reports to senior management on the status of the budget and expenses.
-Effective coordination between different departments and sectors to ensure the completion of work within the unit in an orderly and effective manner
-Develop product pricing plans as a joint responsibility between him and the financial department and in coordination with the commercial sector manager to benefit from the expertise of the marketing department
-Develop an inventory management plan and get rid of stagnant and provide sales expectations to the director of the supply chain sector to work on developing a procurement plan as a joint responsibility with the manager of the commercial sector
*Technical Office & Pricing
-Preparing technical presentations for electrical panel and automation products, including performance data and technical characteristics.
-Respond to customer inquiries and sales specialist about the technical aspects of electrical panels and automation.
-Coordination with various departments to provide the necessary technical information.                                 -Provide technical support to the sales team to enhance their ability to market the products of paintings and automations.
-Preparing visit plans for consultants to display the products of paintings and automation and their updates.
-Review periodic reports on technical description, design and other activities and develop plans to improve their performance
*Design
-Participate in the preparation of electrical panel product design plans.
-Review designs and ensure their compatibility with market and customer requirements.
-Prepare implementation plans and timetables and follow them up periodically.
-Collaborate with production teams to ensure design execution accurately and efficiently.
-Follow up the approval of the first samples before delivering them for production.
-Electrical and mechanical design
-Study the projects to be implemented, determine the nature of the project, make a product tree and determine the costs of the products.
-Coordinate the loading of departments with products and follow up the operational processes in terms of technical characteristics and process progress according to the timings.
-Designing products for each project according to the client's requests, making modifications to products and preparing technical files.                                                                                                                                         --Supervise the work of production machinery programs for products such as cutting programs, CNC programs, and others.
-Supervise the work of engineering drawings such as sweeping, welding, assembly, and copper drawings for all products.
-Follow up the operational processes in other production departments and ensure that they match the customer's request and technical files.
-Preparation of raw materials exchange cards from electrical and mechanical stores (BOM), in addition to preparing designs and technical files.
-Development and innovation in existing product designs and preparation of designs for new products.
-Coordination with procurement departments to purchase components or raw materials for all products, and choose alternative materials if needed.
-Preparation and supervision of the preparation of electrical and mechanical designs for all products and customer requests.
-Preparing and supervising the work of engineering technical files for all products and projects.
-Preparing and supervising the work of shop drawings for all projects.
-Preparation of files for calculations of electrical loads, sequence and synchronization (selectivity and S.C Level).                                                                                                                                                                      -Preparation and supervision of programming (Programming) and graphics of various control circuits and KNX-BMS-PLC systems and their electrical designs.
-Review and approve the technical specifications of raw materials and their conformity with customer requirements.
-Calculate product costs and operating times in different production stages.
-Participate in the preparation of electrical panel product design plans.
-Review designs and ensure their compatibility with market and customer requirements.
-Prepare implementation plans and timetables and follow them up periodically.
-Collaborate with production teams to ensure design execution accurately and efficiently.                               -Follow up the approval of the first samples before delivering them for production.
-Design and programming of industrial automation systems according to customer and project requirements.
-Preparation and implementation of electrical designs for various control systems, including KNX, BMS, PLC, and Scada Systems.                                                                                                                                                   -Develop smart automation solutions to improve operational and production efficiency
-Testing and integration of control systems to ensure optimal operation in accordance with technical standards and specifications.
-Preparing programming and control files for smart systems and supervising their installation and integration with other systems.
-Follow up on technological developments in the field of automation and propose the necessary improvements to the systems used.
-Collaborate with engineering and production teams to ensure that automation systems integrate seamlessly with electrical panels.
 
 *Installments:
-Supervising the implementation of all installation operations at the sites
-Review the technical files and executive drawings for all works and projects and coordinate with the competent departments in the event of amendments or observations
-Coordination and follow-up with consultants and competent authorities at the sites for technical accreditation
-Determine the requests for raw materials, equipment and tools necessary for implementation according to the stages of each project and according to the implementation schedules
-Setting schedules for completing the work and implementing the necessary installations on the specified dates
-Determine the number of workers and technicians required for implementation and to coordinate with the various departments to provide them at the specified times
-Distributing work to technicians at the sites and coordinating between them to achieve the highest rates of implementation
-Supervision and follow-up of supplies and the arrival of raw materials and equipment to the sites, receipt, storage and securing them properly in accordance with the company's instructions
-Managing all administrative work in the sites (housing - transportation - nutrition - allowances - vacations - working hours)                                                                                                                                                            -Ensure the quality of work and implement it in accordance with the specifications and requirements and review the work before tests and delivery to customers
- Supervising the implementation of customer requests, avoiding observations and solving problems on sites
-Coordination with all competent departments to complete the required work on time
-Preparing follow-up reports for the executive position of each project and timetables for all stages
requirements:

MBA is a must.
Experience not less than 5 years.
Experience in panels technical office & tendering.
Leadership.
Project planning.
Management skills.
Decision maker.
Strategic thinking.

title: Cyber Security Engineer
skills: Computer Science, Cyber Security, Engineering, firewalls, Network, Network Security, Security, Security Systems, Software, Information Technology (IT), Networking
description:
Implement cybersecurity solutions that address specific business needs. Leverage his/her expertise to integrate security measures seamlessly into existing systems.
Implement and manage network security measures, including firewalls, intrusion detection/prevention systems, and virtual private networks (VPNs), to safeguard our environments.
Configure access control lists (ACLs), port forwarding, and firewall rules for secure internal and external access.
Configure firewalls with advanced features like application control, web filtering, and IPS.
Create security reports on incidents, risks, and mitigation strategies.
Regularly update firewall policies to meet evolving security needs.
Monitor and respond to security threats, including malware, intrusions, and DoS/DDoS attacks.
Manage WAF to protect against web-based threats and configure security rules.
Implement Zero Trust policies to control access based on identity and device posture.
Oversee endpoint security, including antivirus, malware protection, and patching.
Automate software distribution, vulnerability scanning, and patch management.
Ensure devices are up-to-date with security patches and protection.
Lead incident response efforts, investigate security incidents, and implement corrective actions to address vulnerabilities and mitigate risks.
Conduct comprehensive security assessments, vulnerability scans, and penetration tests. Provide detailed reports and recommendations for enhancing security postures.
Develop and enforce security policies and procedures to ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and industry standards.
Conduct cybersecurity training sessions for internal teams to enhance overall security awareness.
requirements:
Proven work experience as a System Security Engineer or Cyber Security Engineer
Experience in building and maintaining security systems
Detailed technical knowledge of database and operating system security
Hands-on experience in security systems, including firewalls, intrusion detection systems, anti-virus software, authentication systems, log management, content filtering, etc
Experience with network security and networking technologies and with system, security, and network monitoring tools
Thorough understanding of the latest security principles, techniques, and protocols
Familiarity with web-related technologies (Web applications, Web Services, Service service-oriented architecture) and of network/web-related protocols
Problem-solving skills and ability to work under pressure
BS degree in Computer Science or related field

title: Cyber Security Specialist
skills: Computer Science, Network Security
description:
Job Summary:
We are seeking a highly skilled 
Cyber Security Specialist
 to protect our organization's servers, software, and IT infrastructure from cyber threats. The ideal candidate will be responsible for implementing security measures, monitoring for vulnerabilities, responding to security incidents, and ensuring compliance with industry best practices and regulations.
Key Responsibilities:
Design, implement, and maintain security protocols to safeguard company servers, applications, and cloud infrastructure.
Conduct regular security audits, risk assessments, and penetration testing.
Monitor systems for vulnerabilities, threats, and security breaches, responding promptly to incidents.
Develop and enforce security policies, procedures, and best practices across the organization.
Manage firewalls, intrusion detection systems (IDS), and endpoint protection tools.
Ensure secure authentication and authorization mechanisms are in place.
Oversee data protection strategies, including encryption, backup policies, and disaster recovery plans.
Stay up-to-date with emerging cybersecurity threats and technologies, recommending improvements as needed.
Provide training and awareness programs to employees on cybersecurity best practices.
Collaborate with developers and IT teams to integrate security into software development and IT operations (DevSecOps).
requirements:
Required Qualifications & Skills:
Bachelor's degree in 
Cybersecurity, Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field
 (or equivalent experience).
Minimum 
3-5 years of experience
 in cybersecurity roles, with hands-on experience securing servers and software applications.
Strong knowledge of 
network security, cloud security (AWS, Azure, or GCP), and endpoint protection
.
Experience with 
firewalls, intrusion detection/prevention systems (IDS/IPS), SIEM solutions, and vulnerability scanning tools
.
Familiarity with secure coding practices and DevSecOps principles.
Understanding of 
ISO 27001, NIST, GDPR, SOC 2
, and other relevant security frameworks.
Ability to investigate security incidents, analyze logs, and respond to breaches effectively.
Proficiency in scripting and automation tools (e.g., Python, PowerShell, Bash) is a plus.
Cybersecurity certifications such as 
CISSP, CEH, OSCP, or CISM
 are preferred.
Strong problem-solving skills, analytical mindset, and ability to work independently.
Preferred Experience:
Experience securing 
SaaS or web applications
.
Hands-on experience with 
cloud security best practices
 and compliance standards.
Familiarity with 
zero-trust architecture and identity & access management (IAM) solutions
.

title: Product Specialist
skills: Biomedical, Biomedical Engineering, Medical, English, Medical Devices, sales skills, Sales
description:
Role Summary:
As a Product Specialist at Ghalioungui Trading, you will play a pivotal role in promoting our range of medical devices. Your primary responsibility will be to ensure customer satisfaction and achieve sales targets by leveraging your expert knowledge of our products and effective communication skills.
 Key Responsibilities:
-Promote and demonstrate the features and benefits of our medical devices to healthcare professionals and institutions.
-Develop and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders to drive sales growth and market penetration.
-Collaborate with the sales team to develop and execute effective sales strategies.
-Provide product training and support to customers to enhance their understanding and usage of our products.
requirements:
Job Requirements:
1-Bachelor's Degree in Science, Pharmacy, vet, and biomedical engineering.
2- From 1-3 years of experience in a related field within the medical devices industry.
3-Strong understanding of medical device technologies and market trends.
4-Excellent command of English, both written and verbal.
5-Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).

title: Structural Design Engineer
skills: ASD, Revit, Shop Drawings, AutoCAD, Navisworks, Communication, Communication skills, Computer Science, Drawings, Design, Engineering, Information Technology (IT), quality, Skills, structural
description:
Cross-checking IFC drawings (STR-STR), (STR-ARCH), (STR-MEP) to identify clashes& contradictions.
Prepare (design/shop drawings) related RFIs accordingly to either propose solutions to contradictions or retrieve resolutions from lead designer.
Validate structural IFCs from a constructability point of view, do necessary detailing studies for combined & complicated cases to determine optimum approach that minimize construction time.
Draft and finalize Structural shop drawings (concrete dimensions then reinforcement along with BBS) according to received IFCs & RFIs responses.
Ensure that shop drawings are reflecting design intent, adhering to project specs, & detailed to the level that minimize construction time whilst keeping economical quantities.
Coordinate produced concrete dimensions shop drawings with other disciplines (Civil, Arch, MEP…etc.) to identify all intersections, clashes, & penetrations.
Determine and flag all embedded items (anchors, steel connections, hooks...etc.) within concrete skeleton before execution on-site & make sure they are sufficiently detailed within structural shop drawings.
Develop & build a comprehensive REVIT model for the concrete/steel skeleton (if needed) to facilitate structural shop drawings production and coordination process.
requirements:
3 to 8 years of experience in structural shop drawings preparation
Alexandria residence.
Previous experience in design field is a plus.
Previous Revit experience is a Must.
Work effectively with others as team player.
Advanced and flexible people skills.
Excellent communication skills.
Multitasking whilst delivering high-quality results.
Interdepartmental coordination skills.
